tool_description: An API to Request in Real Time TikTok Tops of Users by Country, Global and Hashtags.
name: TikTok Tops
title: TikTok Tops

api_list.name: Top 50 Users by Country Code
api_list.description: Get Top 50 Users by Country Code in Real Time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-tops.p.rapidapi.com/top-users/50/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-tops.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-tops.p.rapidapi.com/top-users/50/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-tops.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
